verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words, \nd Lord\nd*: give heed \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* whisper.
Attend \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* loud cry \w for|strong="H3068"\w* help, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* king \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning, \w hear|strong="H7181"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H6419"\w* ready \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* look \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* no \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* takes pleasure \w in|strong="H3068"\w* wickedness: no \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* evil can \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* guest.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* braggarts \w can|strong="H7451"\w* \w stand|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H1481"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* presence, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* hate all workers \w of|strong="H7451"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* speakers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* lies, \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* blood \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceit \w you|strong="H3605"\w* abhor.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w*, \w through|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* kindness abundant, \w may|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w your|strong="H3068"\w* house, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* towards \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shrine \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* temple \w may|strong="H3068"\w* reverently bow.

Lead \w me|strong="H1004"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H1004"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H7230"\w* enemies. Make \w your|strong="H1004"\w* way level before \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w to|strong="H3068"\w* truth, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* destruction. \w Their|strong="H3068"\w* throat \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wide \w open|strong="H6440"\w* grave, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w smooth|strong="H3474"\w* tongue \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hypocrite.

Condemn \w them|strong="H3588"\w*, God; let \w their|strong="H3588"\w* schemes bring \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* numberless crimes thrust \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* playing \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rebel \w against|strong="H3956"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* let \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* ring \w out|strong="H5080"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* gladness forever. Protect \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* love \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H5307"\w* exult \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w give|strong="H8055"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* blessing, \nd Lord\nd*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* godly, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shield \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* favor protects \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.
